blogPost.excerpt: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰
blogPost.body: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰
blogPost.title: Paid Clubhouse Rooms - Charge $$$ for Clubhouse rooms
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 付费房可以让您托管付费墙式私人会所房间。在不到30秒的时间里就可以设置一个，简单地说：1）用你的电话号码注册 2）输入你的房间细节 3）分享它并获得报酬 💰
付費房可以讓您託管付費牆式私人會所房間。在不到30秒的時間裏就可以設置一個，簡單地說：1）用你的電話號碼註冊 2）輸入你的房間細節 3）分享它並獲得報酬 💰

previous.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
previous.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world

localize.description: Stike允许您使用您的借记卡、信用卡或银行账户以0费用使用比特币闪电网络即时发送和接收资金，传输支付。用户也可以向普通的比特币地址发送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即时汇款，不收取任何费用。

localize.description: Stike允許您使用您的借記卡、信用卡或銀行賬戶以0費用使用比特幣閃電網絡即時發送和接收資金，傳輸支付。用戶也可以向普通的比特幣地址發送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即時匯款，不收取任何費用。

next.excerpt: Filter bubbles impair our ability to communicate with others and threaten our sense of reality. However, many people don't know they are in one! Blindspotter analyzes your news interactions on Twitter and lets you know if you have a blindspot, left or right.
next.title: Blindspotter - Visualize your news blindspots

localize.description: 过滤器气泡损害了我们与他人沟通的能力，威胁到我们的现实感。然而，许多人不知道他们是在一个! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新闻互动，让你知道你是否有盲点，左或右。
localize.tagline: 将您的新闻盲点可视化

localize.description: 過濾器氣泡損害了我們與他人溝通的能力，威脅到我們的現實感。然而，許多人不知道他們是在一個! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新聞互動，讓你知道你是否有盲點，左或右。
localize.tagline: 將您的新聞盲點可視化
